org.docgene.model

Class XMLTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.XMLTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.docgene.model.Alignment, ParagraphElement, ParagraphElementParent, StyledElement

    public class XMLTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParagraphElementParent, ParagraphElement, org.docgene.model.Alignment
    Represent the content of a <table> tag.

    • Field Summary
